titles.title: National Fish and Wildlife Foundation Establishment Act Amendment of 2007
National Fish and Wildlife Foundation Establishment Act Amendment of 2007
National Fish and Wildlife Foundation Establishment Act Amendment of 2008
National Fish and Wildlife Foundation Establishment Act Amendment of 2008
National Fish and Wildlife Foundation Establishment Act Amendment of 2008
National Fish and Wildlife Foundation Establishment Act Amendment of 2008
To amend the National Fish and Wildlife Foundation Establishment Act to increase the number of Directors on the Board of Directors of the National Fish and Wildlife Foundation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, and Oceans.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee Without Recommendation by Unanimous Consent .
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 110-552.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 335.

action.text: Mr. Abercrombie moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 3891.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Boxer without amendment. With written report No. 110-405.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 860.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 7/21/2008--Public Law. National Fish and Wildlife Foundation Establishment Act Amendment of 2008 - Amends the National Fish and Wildlife Foundation Establishment Act to increase the number of members of the board of the National Fish and Wildlife Foundation.
